abstract: The secretary for William R. Salomon, the former head of Salomon Brothers, has been accused of stealing nearly $2 million from her 98-year-old boss.
snippet: The secretary for William R. Salomon, the former head of Salomon Brothers, has been accused of stealing nearly $2 million from her 98-year-old boss.
lead_paragraph: At 98, a venerable banker still goes to the office, even after the name of the storied investment firm he once ran has faded from Wall Street.

headline.main: A Secretary to a Salomon Is Accused of Embezzling
headline.print_headline: A Secretary to a Salomon Is Accused of Embezzling
